description.paragraph2: is a collective of
description.paragraph3: passionate and creative young talents

page-partners.title: Our Partners
page-partners.slogan: We are a part of you

box1.name: Dean Sutcliffe
box1.content: “iMyVenue has worked with NTQ on some projects. I have found NTQ technically sound, and reliable. The quality of work is of a standard that matches our expectation, and is equal to that of local developers in Australia. They are cost effective and efficient solution for our needs.”

box2.name: Linh Nguyen
box2.position: Technical Manager, ROI Marketing Solutions Ltd , UK.
box2.content: “ROI Marketing Solutions Ltd has worked with NTQ Solutions to develop an online marketing application over the past 1 year. During this time, NTQ has demonstrated good technical and communication skills over different parts of the software development cycle such requirement gathers and development. I would not hesitate recommending NTQ Solution for software development.”

box3.name: Yusuke Akinaga
box3.content: “Staffs of NTQ Solution are very dynamic. They create a fun atmosphere while working. About quality, they have captured our Japanese psyche and produced good software products. Nowadays, many Japanese companies are looking for foreign partners in software industry. Our company has luckily found a good partner like NTQ Solution.”

description.paragraph1: We were addressed “crazy” since we decided to separate from a bigger company, holding distinctive dreams along with many passionate young people, taking every single step to build a family, which helps those who are in love with technology reach perfection.
description.paragraph2: We dedicatedly spent time to come down with the company’s name: “NTQ”.
description.paragraph3: To our honorable customers, NTQ stands for “Next Top Quality” bringing customers perfection is our company belief.
description.paragraph4: To us colleagues, NTQ means “Nha Toi Quan”, literally it’s “My Family”. From inside, we are simply not just a company, we are a BIG family.

description.paragraph1: We do not basically develop applications and software, but we love technology, we do investigation, research so as to provide customers with the best solutions, technically and economically.
description.paragraph2: We are now running our own R&D Center with 8 “crazy” experts dedicated in researching technical solutions for customers. At the R&D Center we form a team to develop our own embedded software projects.
description.paragraph3: We guarantee customers’ benefits by reasonable-cost services brought about by Vietnamese enthusiastic technicians working in strict Japanese and Western operational processes.

description.paragraph1: We provide you with the “Smart Offshore Development” service rather than the mere Offshore Development service.
description.paragraph2: Firstly “Smart offshore development” means that NTQ Solutions not only does coding, but also provides solutions, architecture design and detail design. We do detailed design while our customers only need to care about business requirements. For medium size projects 50-100MM we can take care of a complete architecture design for our customers.
description.paragraph3: Secondly instead of accepting the detailed design and carrying out what the documents show, we always aim for bilateral communications. We study, share out ideas and suggestion, so as to become a part of our customers, together with our customers we plan and work closely on the products.

description.paragraph1: To become a leading software development company and
description.paragraph2: globally recognized in the IT industry.

box3.title: We are a part of you.

description.paragraph1: We are committed to always providing high quality products and services, and continuously improving to bring satisfaction to our customers.
description.paragraph2: We evoke passion and train programmers at the world class level.

description.paragraph1: On December 6th 2014, VTV4, a Vietnam science and technology TV channel, during the celebration of Vietnam-Japan 40 years of relationship, had an interview with NTQ Company about the Outsource sector as regards its role in the Japanese economy. It came as a surprise when NTQ became the main focus of the TV program. We considered this opportunity as our reward for all those years working with the Japanese market; it wasn’t because we’re a big company, our working principles do match both countries’ diplomatic relationship standards.
description.paragraph2: We are so happy and proud of this, yet a great motivation to keep moving forward.

box2.description: In this model, the cost is calculated based on the total project execution time and the corresponding effort used. The model is particularly suitable when the specifications of the project are complex.

benefits.paragraph1: Greater flexibility, we provide customers with the necessary resources and team to meet their requirements and their needs

benefits.paragraph1: The best development team suitable for the domains of your expertise

box1.title: Development of a cloud system for Systena Corporation from Japan
box1.description: Systena Corporation is a Japanese IT company listed with first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange and was founded in 1983.  This company covers many businesses such as service solutions, quality designs, framework designs, cloud systems and so on.  Systena Corporation was thinking of extending offshoring business and approaching our company.

the-challenge.paragraph1: The first challenge was technical requirement that we need to create a cloud system that is compatible with 100,000 users and 20,000 heavy accesses.  Moreover, this system should be compatible with Google services and each screen should be dealt with within 1 second. The second challenge was how to maintain existing systems.

competition.paragraph1: There were 5 competitors including our company.

solution.paragraph1: We utilized cloud-based infrastructure such as AWS EC2, RDS, ElasticCache, ElasticBalancer and so on.  Also, we improved performance using Redis and dealt with heavy traffic integrating NodeJS and Java.

result.paragraph1: The company which successfully ended this pilot project was only our company among the 5 companies.  Thanks to this achievement, Systena Corporation has ordered us more projects.  Although we began to do business with the only 1-man-month project, now we are managing a 10-man-month project.  In development filed, our company is in charge of almost all parts of development such as designs, technology, join tests, solutions, measure and in charge of all the projects of cloud system development from Systena Corporation.

box2.title: Development of “Personalized marketing materials system” for ROI Marketing Solutions from UK.
box2.description: ROI Marketing Solutions – a leading provider of web to print, variable data publishing and cross media software based in UK. ROI Marketing Solutions has helped over 500 print providers, agencies and marketing departments to win new business, secure customers loyalty and improve operational efficiencies such as Perivan Solutions, Platinum Print, Northend Creative Print, Creazy and others.

the-challenge.paragraph1: ROI marketing solutions owns a personalized marketing materials system which provides comprehensive list of 37 million UK consumers and in-depth information for marketing purpose. Users of the system are business owners or marketers.
the-challenge.paragraph2: With a huge number of data, the existing system was very slow in returning search results to users (2 to 10 seconds). ROI marketing solutions by that time was seeking for a software company who could assess their existing system and improve the performance.

competition.paragraph1: NTQ Solution had to compete with 6 other companies: 5 companies from Vietnam and 1 company from the Czech republic.

solution.paragraph1: NTQ Solution built our own complicated algorithms based on bitwise operators. More specifically we moved all data and store them in memory, implemented indexing for faster queries, after that we processed the data in bit-wise operators. And to improve disk I/O performance, simple cache file mechanics was implemented.

result.paragraph1: We went through the challenge by obtaining a speed of 0.1 to 0.5 seconds from proceeding a search request to returning results and our results impressed customers as all other competitors came out with slower performance. Thanks to that, NTQ Solution was selected and has been collaborating with ROI Marketing Solutions in a long period of time in the current OSDC contract.

box3.title: Development of a mobile social network system (SNS) for IT Sherpa Ltd a Japanese Company.
box3.description: IT Sherpa is a software company based in Japan and was established in 2000. Their main focus is providing internet solutions, hosting & system consulting service, ASP (Application service provider) service and mobile/smartphone application development. NTQ Solution participated in a business matching conference in Japan and we became aware of IT Sherpa Company at the conference. After that NTQ Solution paid a visit to IT Sherpa office.

the-challenge.paragraph1: The customer required NTQ Solution to study an existing SNS in one month and after that we had created specifications for the customers. The project requires newest technologies for real-time video call, voice call functionalities.
the-challenge.paragraph2: There were two most time-consuming features of the project: the first one is “Chat” feature which requires managing a huge amount of data at the same time between client & server; and the second one is “Meet people” feature ensuring access at a high-speed with a large volume of data and complex search conditions. It requires a capability to support a huge number of users up to 100000 users per day and up to 3 million chat messages every day.

solution.paragraph1: About the video and conference call, at the client side we used API of PortSIP and at the server side we used FreeSWITCH. For better performance at the client side we had to handle the image caching to ensure that the application is not slow at some screens which display a large number of images. For better performance of huge data being exchanged every day, we used 3 shading databases. And we also use our own algorithms based on bitwise operators to process data in memory.

technologies.paragraph1: Cocoa touch, Core services, core Media, coreTelephony, StoreKit, Message framework, ImageIO

result.paragraph1: NTQ Solution built for ITSherpa a complete state of the art Social Network System.

box4.title: Development of photo sharing iOS and Android applications for Spicy Cinnamon Pte. Ltd.
box4.description: Spicy Cinnamon is a software company based in Thailand specializing development of software for interactive digital media. The company was established in 2012. Came up with idea of a photo group sharing application, Cinnamon was seeking for a software development partner. By that time via a mutual friend, Cinnamon was introduced to NTQ Solution, and right after that Spicy Cinnamon decided to visit NTQ Solution office in Vietnam and requested us to build the photo sharing app.

the-challenge.paragraph1: The first challenge we met is technical requirement related to processing continuous upload of many high quality images with big size and assuring the uploading images not been lost in case of slow or disconnected Internet connection.
the-challenge.paragraph2: The second challenge is to view a big number of images on one screen and to make sure the screen works smooth and without memory overflow.

solution.paragraph1: For the first challenge, we come up of with the solution: dividing images into low quality and high quality then put the low quality images at high priority; using Core Data to handle caching, images are only deleted from cache when it is uploaded successfully; and process background uploading to avoid blocking other activities of users.
solution.paragraph2: With the second challenge, we use the asynchronous mechanism to upload images and use ARC to manage memory and release memory area right when the process is done. Applying the same technique as uploading images, we also view low quality image first and then the high quality ones.

technologies.paragraph2: Cocoa touch, core services, core graphics & location, Facebook SDK
technologies.paragraph6: Google Maps, Google play services, Facebook SDK

result.paragraph1: NTQ Solution successfully built for Spicy Cinnamon a complete state of the photo group sharing iOS and Android apps.
result.paragraph2: Seconds become one of the world's fastest and easiest ways to chat photos and share photos with friends and families. Seconds application got an Award from SONY at Mobile World Congress in Spain 2013.

description.paragraph1: If you have been exposed to NTQ Solution people, visit NTQ facebook or join an event of NTQ, you will realize that NTQ Solution has created not only a working environment for people to work together, strieve and develop.
description.paragraph2: Besides work, we build for entire company members playing fields through periodic teambuilding activities. In addition, we broadcast own VON program every month and the “NTQ's i Muzik” music gift program weekly and organize other activities to bring balance between life and work for every member of the company.
description.paragraph3: Each NTQ person sees the company as a family, where we feel the closeness, friendlyness and sharing, where we can have opportunities to express and define ourselves.
description.paragraph4: So if you want to see how really different Solution NTQ is to consider working in our company, you can study us, visit us, and talk with us. We believe that you will see NTQ Solution is an attractive destination for business and for something more that you are looking for.

box3.description: Please send your CV and application letter to our HR recruitment department via email address:

title.title-small: Gain advantages through outsourcing your software development to us

description.paragraph1: NTQ Solution is always updated with the latest development technologies to develop for you a software standing out from others and therefore help you competing in the market and taking advantage of economies scale.
description.paragraph2: When you don’t have enough engineering resources or there is no software engineer available to work for your software development, hiring a software development vendor is the best strategy for you. NTQ Solution has been serving many product development projects and we believe that we have our available expertise in software development to adapt your resources needs.
description.paragraph3: Or you plan to save costs by hiring offshore software developers at reasonable rates. You can consider us as one of the best candidates as we are a Vietnam-based software company. And the medium rate in Vietnam is definitely reasonable comparing to other software outsourcing destinations.
description.paragraph4: The other reason for you to outsource your software development work to us is when you want to have all your current resources focusing on your core business. Outsource your non-core software development to us will enable the efficiency for your core business and at the same time reduce your operational cost.

title.title-small: When you need a solutions consultancy service, you can contact us. We serve this service for you with NO COST at all

description.paragraph1: Practically it’s not always easy for you to find optimal software solutions or to answer the technical questions for your current software projects or software projects that you plan to develop in the future. Especially when your questions concern one of the latest technologies that not many people know or when it’s not within your knowledge expertise.
description.paragraph2: Once you are not quite ready for your projects yet or you may concern to pay for a consultancy service to support for your decision, then you simply want to find a solution for free. You may find what you look for somewhere on the Internet, on a book or with support from people that you know. But what if those sources can not help? Our free-cost consultancy will soothe your worries.
description.paragraph3: You can contact us to let us help you. Our expertises will support you to solve all your concerns related to technical problems or solutions for your software projects.

title.title-small: Complete your software with our most trendy mobile and web app graphic design

description.paragraph1: To provide you completed software solutions and development service pack including not only technical design and development but also UI graphic design, we have in-house graphic designers.
description.paragraph2: NTQ Solution understands the increasingly higher and higher requirements on the graphic design bringing more and more exciting experience for users, so our design team always try our best to bring creativity into your products in order to satisfy you as well your customers.
description.paragraph3: Our graphic design team has over 8 years of experience working with customers in different countries. So in terms of graphic design quality, we guarantee to deliver quality products designed in accordance with modern trend as flat design or general trend for future is simple-oriented design while ensuring high aesthetic and convenience for users.
description.paragraph4: Our graphic design service are for web, mobile and desktop applications.
description.paragraph5: In terms of web design, if you plan to have a web running on all screen sizes of different devices, you can request a responsive web design. Your responsive site will be easy to read or navigated with a minimum of resizing, panning and scrolling.
description.paragraph6: To optimize your manpower and communication time for the project, we recommend you choose full service pack including graphic design so that we can give you an overall solution fullestly.

title.title-small1: Seize your business flexibility through iPhone/ iPad and Android apps
title.title-small2: iPhone/ iPad development – One of the most secured and stable platforms of mobile app development
title.title-small3: Android app development - One of the top most chosen platforms for stylish and wonderful utility apps

description.paragraph1: You may wonder the reason to go for a mobile native app and for which reasons native mobile apps have advantages over web applications? The answer is because a mobile application is faster than a web app and it has better user experience. And for the first two reasons more and more people just prefer native. Besides a native app takes advantages of microphones, cameras, GPS, etc. Last but not least, a mobile native app can run without Internet connection.
description.paragraph2: So you may choose a mobile application for the reasons above. If you are looking for a mobile development team to build mobile applications for your business, let NTQ Solution adapt to your needs!
description.paragraph3: Download NTQ Solution iOS profile
description.paragraph5: Our qualified iOS developers with solid experience and thorough understanding of Apple development resources will make you totally confident to let us work for your projects right from the beginning.
description.paragraph6: A trial project is also could be an option if you want to smooth any of other concern before proceeding on your real or big project.
description.paragraph7: We guarantee to bring you outstanding iPhone/iPad applications that make your business differed from others and impressively recognized.
description.paragraph13: Android’s market share is being increased still further. With convenience features to bring stylish, wide range of feasibility and few restrictions for users, Android application could be chosen by you, in order to access to other large number of users besides iPhone/ iPad users.
description.paragraph14: Our Android developers are expert in Android application technologies and will hand over you Android applications that make you or your clients happy to use and love it.
description.paragraph15: We focus on improving stability and improving responsiveness of Android app by taking care of avoiding memory leaks, moving long-running operations off the main thread to worker threads, minimizing complexity of layouts, etc.

title.title-small: Your expectation is visual through every application that we deliver to you

description.paragraph1: Since recognize your need of creating powerful and innovative web applications, which bring your business closer to the audience, and at the same time distinct your value from competitors, we think about that need thoroughly to accomplish your technical requirements and use our depth understanding of UI/UX to apply the best user experience for your apps.
description.paragraph2: If your need is not just to have your web running on desktop, but also on mobile web browsers, then you will need responsive web apps. We will plan, design, develop and deliver your web application that can be boosted in every browser and on number of devices that you desire. Our developers will work closely with graphic designers to turn your ideas into life.

description.paragraph4: Popular frameworks & technologies for web user interface:

title.title-small1: Enable you to achieve business excellence through embedded intelligence

description.paragraph1: At NTQ Solution, we provide a full range of embedded software development service including concept development, design and implementation.
description.paragraph2: With our expertise in 8bit microchip, Intelligence sensor, LPF, Kalman Filter, PID controller and other embedded technologies, Aim at turning your design into a fully functional system. More information about 8-bit microchip and intelligence sencor that we have been working on can be found here:
description.paragraph3: We are proud of our R&D center where our embedded software team has successfully created a remote control airplane. Our team wrote a stabilizer software for this plane and with its own stabilizer the plane can auto balance vertically and horizontally. Besides, the team has also developed a streaming software, that transmits real-time video from the airplane to personal computer through Wi-Fi signal.
description.paragraph4: Currently our embedded software team is now working on 2 embedded software projects to develop 2 products for ourselves.
description.paragraph5: The objective of one project is to produce a robot which can move like a gecko and clean the whole windows of a tower or building. In the other project, we are going to make a flying car - a RF controlled model, conceptual design, but moves like a champ.

title.title-small: We serve better analysis results in health-care sector

description.paragraph1: NTQ Solution staffs have about five years experience working in healthcare software projects. Our people have been participated in number of healthcare software projects for Fujifilm – a leading healthcare company in Japan.
description.paragraph2: We are familiar with medical image processing, visualization and analysis. The applications that we have worked on enable quantitative analysis of medical image based on enthancement of its visualization.

paragraph3.text2: application supports doctors in disease diagnosis. It reads images from different modalities, displays multi images in one screen and supports user to be able to arrange images with customized layouts. With multi-layout view doctors can easily compare images to perform diagnosis.

description.paragraph4: Besides, the application provides full range of image processing features such as lookup table (LUT) processing, zoom in/out, panning, image exchanging, image inverting, rotating, cropping, etc as well as annotation processing such as text marker, line, rectangle, polygon, circle, etc.

paragraph5.text2: was aimed to be simplified with new graphic user interface of an existing system for better user experience and get upgraded with new applications.

description.paragraph6: The receipt application is developed for registering patient information and it is connected to many devices/systems such as BRC, MCR, RIS, HIS, Synapse (PACS), etc.
description.paragraph7: And the QA application is developed for technologists in order to edit and adjust medical images and base on the final result they will decide the image quality and whether to re-take.
description.paragraph8: The developers also need to migrate the existing system to the modern development platforms to enable future maintenance. It's actually a big volume of development tasks.

paragraph9.text2: provides features to examine images, determine breast cancer in women more precisely and support breast cancer operation.

description.paragraph10: With high-resolution monitor and enhanced image processing of Fujifilm, the system improves the ability to highlight observed objects and decide the suspected position.
description.paragraph11: After detecting the object position, calculation of the coordinates is processed and the real distance from the need tip to the operation table is displayed on the screen. The systems allows performing operations horizontally and veritically.

title.title-medium: Several components integrated in one whole system
title.title-small1: Implementing system integration, physically or functionally you can have your existing computing systems and software applications linked together to act as one large complete system

description.paragraph1: NTQ Solution works with you to understand your business goals and we will find a way to seamlessly integrate an accelerated solution to help you meet those goals.
description.paragraph2: We help businesses cross into the high performance area at an accelerated speed. Moreover, we understand that new solutions must scale fast and supplement a part of or all existing systems and business processes for adding more value.
description.paragraph3: Our system integration engineers with a broad range of skills including software engineering, interface protocols, and problem solving skills have adapted to solve difficulties in integration projects that they have been working on.
description.paragraph4: Enterprise application integration is the process of linking business software within a single enterprise together in order to simplify and automate business processes to the greatest extent possible, while at the same time avoiding having to make sweeping changes to the existing applications or data structures. Applications can be linked either at the back-end (database/DB) or the front-end (Graphic User Interface/GUI).
description.paragraph5: We have recently developed a middleware to enable integration of systems and applications of IT service management system across an enterprise.

title.title-small1: We develop applications for your enterprise to win challenges and to adapt rapid changes of market demand

description.paragraph1: Enterprise solutions are software applications that allow your staff to access and manage real-time information and transaction processes across your entire organization. Innovative and comprehensive solutions deliver value by increasing business process efficiency, enhancing workforce productivity, saving operating costs, boosting employee and customer satisfaction, and supporting better and more quickly business decisions.
description.paragraph2: Our comprehensive capabilities enable cross-functional teams to define your business process, implement application logic and integrate existing applications or databases. Moreover, the cross-functional teams work collaboratively with intuitive and graphical team to design and control business logics and application workflows.
description.paragraph3: We find that it's hard to earn a business trust from you at the very first time, so we propose a trial project in this case. As far as you see the results, you can rely on a NTQ Enterprise software development team to bring the most challenging enterprise projects to launch.
description.paragraph4: We understand that simple development of applications is not enough especially for enterprise applications. It requires continuous support and maintenance along with periodic upgrades. We'd like us to be partners in a long-term trust in this regard.

title.title-medium: The cloud helps your business more effective
title.title-small: Cloud computing makes your most important software accessible from any computer or mobile device

description.paragraph1: You may notice that more and more people are getting to know about cloud and ask for it.
description.paragraph2: A cloud-based software does not require to be installed on any desktop computer or any other device and it’s known as software as a service (SaaS). The cloud-based software helps your business available and accessible from anywhere and at any time, therefore you serve your clients more efficiently. Besides, a cloud-based software supports instant updates, and track project progress in real-time.
description.paragraph3: We help you build and maintain your application in the cloud. We use Azure (from Microsoft), Google AppEngine and other Platforms as a Service (PaaS) for application development and deployment.
description.paragraph4: We use cloud and other advanced technologies and techniques to enable your business opportunities and to increase the projects’ ROI for you while high quality is guaranteed.

title.title-medium: Develop e-commerce software for your online business
title.title-small: We assist you in the implementation of all E-commerce softwares in order to bring your online business to success

description.paragraph1: Starting an online business can be a profitable venture if it is planned and executed correctly. One of the essential step is to choose a software development vendor to develop the e-commerce system for you, and you can consider us as your trusted vendor.
description.paragraph2: We can provide you a custom design for your e-commerce site or software that builds a sustainable long-term unique brand identity for your business. By doing so, a sustainable customer base is formed because people are attracted to appealing and compelling designs and if it is unique, it will be more memorable.
description.paragraph3: To develop for you a success e-commerce software, we care about other elements related to your online business. Those elements include choosing for you a CMS for managing your Blog, Creating Articles and Press Releases and developing necessary features for your e-commerce such as Marketing and Upsell Features, SEO features, Security, Online payment, Performance and Scalability for a big volume of consumers, etc.
description.paragraph4: We also offer you mobile e-commerce app development when you want to access the huge number of users who are using their mobile devices to research and find products online.
description.paragraph5: Team up with us to start your e-commerce project now.

title.title: R&D Center
title.title-large: R&D center, we focus on studying about the solution for Big data, Embedded and Cloud-based software.
title.title-medium: Currently our embedded software team is now working on 2 embedded software projects to develop 2 products for ourselves
title.name: Nguyen Xuan Viet Tuan 〈Technical leader of Embedded Project Team〉

description.paragraph1: Besides, in order to develop our own social network application, we also study deeply about technologies related to voice call, group call, etc.
description.paragraph2: Our embedded software team has successfully created a remote control airplane. Our team wrote stabilizer software for this plane and with its own stabilizer, the plane can auto balance vertically and horizontally.
description.paragraph3: In addition, the team has also developed streaming software that transmits real-time video from the airplane to personal computer through Wi-Fi signal
description.paragraph4: The objective of one project is to produce a robot which can move like a gecko and clean the whole windows of a tower or building. In the other project, we are going to build a conceptual design for a flying car.
description.paragraph5: Elder is built with the purpose of reducing the time and efforts to clean high buildings from outside. The fact of a cleaning job (a skyscraper in New York)
description.paragraph6: :Cleaning windows on skyscraper building is very dangerous and heavy works for human.  This work must be done in only a good weather condition and it takes about a month to clean the whole tower from top to bottom.  Besides, in the Hearts Tower case (New York), it took $ 3,000,000 to build its own cleaning rig but most window cleaners left out scratches on windows glass while moving.  Then, we got a clue from Stanford’s sticky bot and carefully analyze gecko’s movement.  Currently, we are planning to develop Elder’s function as below.
description.paragraph7: It can run quickly on the vertical glass, concrete, rock, wood surface and react to position and path guiding by ultrasonic sound. A hall-effect sensor helps Elder predict the reliability of the surface. Then it determines to step forward or turn back. Accelerometer detects the free fall state, and then the emergency parachute is landed.
description.paragraph8: A flying car would have to be capable of safely taking off, flying and landing throughout urban environments; it would also require very powerful engines. In reality, many designs of fly car have suffered from problems such as easily losing stability, not being able to travel far and big noises. In the other project, we are going to build a conceptual design for a flying car - a RF controlled model, which moves sophisticatedly but powerfully.
description.paragraph9: I truly believe that changing the way we are using machine is changing our GENE. Making machines is making human evolution.
